name: Minotaur LCD
description:
This game was made in about a day after remembering I had signed up for the 4th Historically Accurate Game Jam. The Theme was Mythology. This is a LCD rendition of the classic myth of Theseus and the Minotaur.

The Controls

WASD to move in the desired direction.

This game was inspired by the idea of your grandma coming home from a trip to Greece and giving you this as a souvenir because she knows "you like video games".
